metadata.title: CVE-2022-32978 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - low.
metadata.description: There is an assertion failure in SingleComponentLSScan::ParseMCU in singlecomponentlsscan.cpp in libjpeg before 1.64 via an empty JPEG-LS scan.

notes.note: jdstrand> libjpeg-turbo is a fork of libjpeg8

criterions.comment: libjpeg package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
libjpeg9 package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
